lines.text: How about this: he set the fire to hide the tattoos on him and his friend!
Well, those would give them away as <c=#FF0000>Go</c> and <c=#0000FF>Stop</c> wizards if someone investigated, so...
The plan was to just burn them right off!
Off his friend's back, and his own face.
Drastic times call for drastic measures!
And that was his first priority, with Slick pointing a gun at him? Hide the tattoos the guy'd already seen?
Yeah, that'd make more sense if Slick wasn't there... and if it was to fool <c=#FF00FF>us.</c>
Not a lot more sense, mind you.
You're still proposin' the guy's plan was to burn off his own face.
Okay, okay, yeah, maybe not brilliant idea #1.
